description.oldValue: Attention: We halted rollout at Public.  It is not in GCC or GCC-H yet, and the feature continues to be paused at this time.  We appreciate your understanding and patience. When joining a meeting in Microsoft Teams Rooms with a personal laptop running Microsoft Teams, the video galleries on both the Teams Room and laptops will be optimized to display only remote attendees.  (Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms is required)
description.newValue: This feature enables IT admins to block anonymous users from accessing the chat in internally hosted meetings by disabling the read access on top of the existing disabled right access.
